Name: dpy-10 repair

Name: crECA39
Use: sgRNA to generate the ben-1 F200Y allele swap in N2

Name: crECA41
Use: repair template to generate the ben-1 F200Y allele swap in N2

Name: crECA44

Name: oECA1302
Use: reverse primer to confirm ben-1 deletion
